input_query:
You plan to visit 5 European cities for 26 days in total. You only take direct flights to commute between cities. You would like to visit Dubrovnik for 7 days. You want to spend 4 days in Stockholm. You plan to visit relatives in Stockholm between day 7 and day 10. You want to spend 7 days in Dublin. From day 1 to day 7, there is an annual show you want to attend in Dublin. You want to spend 7 days in Munich. You want to spend 5 days in Mykonos.

Here are the cities that have direct flights:
Dublin and Dubrovnik, Dublin and Munich, Stockholm and Dubrovnik, Stockholm and Munich, Dubrovnik and Munich, Dublin and Stockholm, Munich and Mykonos.

Find a trip plan of visiting the cities for 26 days by taking direct flights to commute between them.
